PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-00022013-01-11,  ,  ,  FIN, 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectBritish Columbia Forestry Revitalization Remission Order
PrecisBRITISH COLUMBIA FORESTRY REVITALIZATION REMISSION ORDER to (1) provide to each eligible taxpayer of taxes paid or payable by the taxpayer under the Income Tax Act as a result of payments from the 2011 Contractor Mitigation Account Subtrust (the Subtrust); and (2) remit interest and penalties related to income taxes in respect of the previous payments from the BC Forest Revitalization Trust and the BC Forestry Revitalization Trust II, as well as in respect of the payments from the Subtrust.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2013-0001 Publication Date: 2013-01-16
AttachmentsAttachment
